SELECT CCM.ccomu_bno , CCM.ccomu_title , CCM.COM_ID , CCM.CCOMU_HIT , CCM.CCOMU_DATE FROM C_COMMUNITY CCM
ORDER BY ccomu_bno DESC
SELECT CCM.ccomu_bno , CCM.ccomu_title , CCM.COM_ID , CCM.CCOMU_HIT , CCM.CCOMU_DATE FROM C_COMMUNITY CCM WHERE CCM.COM_ID = #{com_id} ORDER BY ccomu_bno DESC

SELECT CCM.ccomu_bno , CCM.ccomu_title , CCM.COM_ID , CCM.CCOMU_CONTENT , CCM.CCOMU_HIT , CCM.CCOMU_DATE
FROM C_COMMUNITY CCM WHERE CCM.CCOMU_BNO = #{ccomu_bno}
SELECT CMM.CCOMU_BNO ,CMM.CCOMM_ID ,CMM.CCOMM_BODY ,CMM.COM_ID ,CMM.CCOMU_GOOD FROM C_COMMENTS CMM WHERE CMM.CCOMU_BNO = #{ccomu_bno} order by CCOMM_ID asc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO C_COMMUNITY ( CCOMU_BNO ,CCOMU_TITLE ,CCOMU_CONTENT ,COM_ID ) VALUES ( ( SELECT (NVL(MAX(CCOMU_BNO), 0)+1) FROM C_COMMUNITY ), #{ ccomu_title }, #{ ccomu_content }, #{ com_id } )
insert into C_COMMENTS( CCOMU_BNO, CCOMM_ID, CCOMM_BODY, COM_ID, CCOMU_GOOD ) values ( #{ccomu_bno}, (SELECT (NVL(MAX(CCOMM_ID), 0)+1) FROM C_COMMENTS ), #{ccomm_body}, #{com_id}, 0 )
INSERT INTO C_COMMENTS_LIKE (COMMENT_LIKE_BNO, CCOMU_BNO, CCOMM_ID, COM_ID) VALUES ( (SELECT (NVL(MAX(COMMENT_LIKE_BNO), 0)+1) FROM C_COMMENTS_LIKE ), #{ccomu_bno}, #{ccomm_id}, #{com_id})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM C_COMMENTS_LIKE WHERE CCOMU_BNO = #{ccomu_bno} AND CCOMM_ID = #{ccomm_id} AND COM_ID = #{com_id}
